sen.j: 脇坂 安興（わきさか やすおき）は、播磨国龍野藩の第4代藩主。
sen.e: Yasuoki WAKISAKA was the forth lord of the Tatsuno domain, Harima Province.
Yasuoki WAKISAKA was the forth lord of the Tatsuno domain of Harima Province.
sen.cmt: , harima Provinceを of Hrima Provinceに変更
sen.e: Yasuoki WAKISAKA was the forth lord of the Tatsuno domain of Harima Province.
He was the sixth generation of the Wakisaka family, the Tatsuno domain.
He was the sixth generation of the Wakisaka family of the Tatsuno domain.
sen.cmt: , the Tatsuno domainを of the Tatsuno domainに変更
sen.e: He was the sixth generation of the Wakisaka family of the Tatsuno domain.

sen.j: 享保2年（1717年）5月11日、第3代藩主・安清の三男（異説として次男）として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the third son (heresy: the second son) of the third lord of domain Yasuzumi on June 19, 1717.
He was born as the third son (heresy: the second son) of the third lord of the domain Yasuzumi, on June 19, 1717.
sen.cmt: heresyの後ろにコロン（:）を挿入。Domainに定冠詞theを付与。
sen.e: He was born as the third son (heresy: the second son) of the third lord of the domain Yasuzumi, on June 19, 1717.

sen.j: 兄・安貞が早世したために世子となり、享保7年（1722年）の父の死去で後を継いだ。
sen.e: He succeeded to the post after his father's death in 1722 since his elder brother Yasusada died early.
He succeeded to the post after his father's death in 1722 since his elder brother Yasusada died earlier.
He succeeded to the post after his father's death in 1722 since his elder brother Yasusada died earlier.

sen.j: 享保16年（1731年）12月に叙任される。
sen.e: He had appointment in December, 1731.
He received the appointment in December, 1731.
sen.cmt: had appointment をreceived the appoitmentに変更
sen.e: He received the appointment in December, 1731.

sen.j: 元文5年（1740年）には龍野の史書である「龍野志」が編纂された。
sen.e: Tatsuno's history book, "Tatsunoshi" was compiled in 1740.
Tatsuno's history book, "Tatsunoshi" was compiled in 1740.
Tatsuno's history book, "Tatsunoshi" was compiled in 1740.

sen.j: 延享4年（1747年）8月10日に死去し、跡を長男・安弘が継いだ。
sen.e: He died on September 14, 1747 and his eldest son Yasuhiro succeeded to the post.
He died on September 14, 1747 and his eldest son Yasuhiro succeeded to the post.
He died on September 14, 1747 and his eldest son Yasuhiro succeeded to the post.

sen.j: 墓所：京都市右京区花園の妙心寺隣花院。
sen.e: Grave: Rinka-in, Myoshin-ji Temple in Hanazono, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Grave: Rinka-in, Myoshin-ji Temple in Hanazono, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Grave: Rinka-in, Myoshin-ji Temple in Hanazono, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Seigen-ji Temple in Aoyama.
Seigen-ji Temple in Aoyama.
Seigen-ji Temple in Aoyama.
